bgm.name: 花果山 - 桃源仙境
bgm.description: 轻快活泼的国风民乐。以清脆的笛子为主旋律，模拟鸟鸣与山间清风。伴奏使用轻巧的琵琶拨奏和木鱼点缀。AI Prompt: Upbeat traditional Chinese folk music, playful Dizi (bamboo flute) melody, light Pipa plucking, wooden fish percussion, sunny and peaceful atmosphere of a mystical mountain, 4/4 time, 110 BPM.

bgm.name: 水帘洞 - 秘境幽居
bgm.description: 空灵、带有水滴感的氛围音。使用古筝的流水式刮奏，配合深沉的洞箫，背景有隐约的溶洞回声。AI Prompt: Ethereal ambient Chinese music, Guzheng glissando simulating flowing water, deep Dongxiao (vertical flute), reverb-heavy cave acoustics, mystical and serene, meditative.

bgm.name: 天庭 - 云端漫步
bgm.description: 宏大且带有仙气的管弦乐。加入编钟和云锣的金属质感，丝竹乐器编织出华丽的织体。AI Prompt: Grand orchestral Chinese court music, Bianzhong (bronze bells) and Yunluo, majestic silk and bamboo ensemble, heavenly and ethereal, slightly pompous but bright.
bgm.mood: 庄严但略显滑稽的拘束感

bgm.name: 小怪乱斗 - 马喽撒野
bgm.description: 极快节奏的打击乐。以中国大鼓和铙钹为主，间歇穿插急促的唢呐，表现出混乱又有趣的战斗场面。AI Prompt: Fast-paced Chinese percussion ensemble, energetic Taiko and cymbals, frantic Suona riffs, chaotic and funny battle theme, high energy, 150 BPM.

bgm.name: BOSS 战 - 齐天威压
bgm.description: 融合现代元素的国风摇滚。重金属电吉他与古筝速奏结合，鼓点厚重，史诗感十足。AI Prompt: Epic Chinese Rock Fusion, aggressive Guzheng shredding meets heavy electric guitar riffs, thunderous war drums, heroic and intense, high stakes boss fight.

bgm.name: 获得宝物/升级
bgm.description: 简短的上升音阶。由云锣和笛子奏响，最后以清脆的铃声收尾。AI Prompt: Short triumphant Chinese jingle, ascending pentatonic scale, bright Yunluo bells and flute, celebratory and rewarding, 5 seconds.

bgm.name: 马喽闯祸/失败
bgm.description: 滑稽的滑音笛子或低音唢呐，表现出垂头丧气的感觉。AI Prompt: Comical failure sound, sliding pitch on a Suona, 'wah-wah-wah' trombone style but with Chinese instruments, goofy and lighthearted.

sfx.name: 脚步声
sfx.description: 草地/石地上的轻快爪子扑击声。Light patter of monkey paws on grass/stone, quick and agile, slight jingle of a small bell.

sfx.name: 攻击 (金箍棒/木棍)
sfx.description: 棍棒划破空气的呼啸声，接着是沉闷的打击声。Whoosh of a staff swinging through air, followed by a solid wooden 'thwack' impact.

sfx.name: 受伤
sfx.description: 高频的猴子唧唧声，听起来很萌。High-pitched 'Ouch!' monkey chirp, cute and funny rather than painful.

sfx.name: 二段跳/翻跟头
sfx.description: 带有旋风效果的“砰”声，类似筋斗云的小型爆发。Magical 'poof' sound with a swirling wind effect, like a small cloud exploding.

sfx.name: 风声/仙气
sfx.description: 山间微风夹杂着细微的水晶闪烁感。Whistling mountain breeze mixed with subtle crystalline sparkles.

sfx.name: 仙桃采摘
sfx.description: 清脆的弹出声加上多汁的叶片摩擦声。A satisfying 'pop' followed by a juicy rustle of leaves.

sfx.name: 流水/瀑布
sfx.description: 巨大的瀑布奔流声，带有节奏感的溅水声。Rushing water of a grand waterfall, white noise with a rhythmic splashing base.

sfx.name: 点击确认
sfx.description: 两根竹板敲击的清脆声。Crisp sound of two bamboo sticks hitting each other.

sfx.name: 打开菜单
sfx.description: 纸质卷轴缓缓展开的沙沙声。Soft unfolding of a paper scroll.

sfx.name: 取消/返回
sfx.description: 低沉的木鱼敲击声。A low-pitched wooden 'clop', like a hollow wood block.

sfx.name: 吃桃子
sfx.description: 嘎嘣脆的多汁咬合声，随后是满足的“啊”声。Crunchy, juicy biting sound, followed by a satisfied 'Ah'.

sfx.name: 穿戴装备
sfx.description: 金色甲片碰撞的金属摩擦声。Metallic clink of golden armor pieces fitting together.
